content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":158401,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方はどうですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How about you?\""},{"lineNumber":158402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I am\""},{"lineNumber":158403,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……失礼、口が過ぎたようで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Excuse me, I may have spoken out of turn.\""},{"lineNumber":158404,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやいや」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, no.\""},{"lineNumber":158405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっ、仕事はいくらでもある。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, there’s plenty of work to do."},{"lineNumber":158406,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君も君の仕事をまっとうしてくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You also fulfill your duties.\""},{"lineNumber":158407,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":158408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew...\""},{"lineNumber":158409,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりあえず今は庇ったが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, I’ve defended you, but...\""},{"lineNumber":158410,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さてさて、どこで何をしておられるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, where and what have you been doing?\""},{"lineNumber":158411,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおお！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa!?"},{"lineNumber":158412,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんじゃ、貴様ら！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Who are you guys!?\""},{"lineNumber":158413,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービル内を進むと、","translatedEnglishLine":"As they proceeded inside the Hyper Building,"},{"lineNumber":158414,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はみすぼらしい格好の老人と出くわした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others encountered an old man in shabby clothes."},{"lineNumber":158415,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、は、こっちの台詞だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What? H-hey, the same goes for you."},{"lineNumber":158416,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こじきか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you a beggar?\""},{"lineNumber":158417,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰がこじきじゃ、馬鹿もん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who are you calling a beggar, you idiot!"},{"lineNumber":158418,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これを見て分からんか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can't you tell by looking at this!\""},{"lineNumber":158419,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはハイパービル内の真ん中で、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the middle of the Hyper Building, Rance saw,"},{"lineNumber":158420,"originalJapaneseLine":"無造作に置かれたミカン箱と、","translatedEnglishLine":"a casually placed box of mandarins,"},{"lineNumber":158421,"originalJapaneseLine":"その上の原稿用紙とペンを見た。","translatedEnglishLine":"and on top of it, manuscript paper and a pen."},{"lineNumber":158422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こじき？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Beggar?\""},{"lineNumber":158423,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アホか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you stupid!\""},{"lineNumber":158424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドエススキー先生！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Professor Does-ski!\""},{"lineNumber":158425,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　なんじゃ、お前さんは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Who are you?\""},{"lineNumber":158426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お久しぶりです、サチコです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Long time no see, I'm Sachiko.\""},{"lineNumber":158427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、こいつと知り合いなのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You know this guy?\""},{"lineNumber":158428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ランスさんも会ったことありますよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Rance-san has met him before, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":158429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「知らん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know.\""},{"lineNumber":158430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……記憶にないのう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I don't recall.\""},{"lineNumber":158431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えーーー……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wh-why...?"},{"lineNumber":158432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんで二人とも忘れられるんですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"How can you both forget...?\""},{"lineNumber":158433,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、騒がしいのう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, noisy bunch."},{"lineNumber":158434,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いったいお前さんら何しにここまで来た」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just what did you all come here for?\""},{"lineNumber":158435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それはこっちの台詞だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s my question."},{"lineNumber":158436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだってこんな場所にいやがる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Why are you in a place like this?"},{"lineNumber":158437,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おかげで探すのに苦労したぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've made it hard to find you.\""},{"lineNumber":158438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ、この高い部屋から見える景色、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, the view from this high room,"},{"lineNumber":158439,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これが儂の創作意欲を疼かせるのじゃ」","translatedEnglishLine":"inspires my creative drive.\""},{"lineNumber":158440,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分からないことがあったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If there’s something you don’t understand,"},{"lineNumber":158441,"originalJapaneseLine":"　エロヤックに聞けば大抵答えが得られるしの」","translatedEnglishLine":"usually you can get answers by asking Eroyak.\""},{"lineNumber":158442,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハイデス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes."},{"lineNumber":158443,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ワタシ　センセイノ　タメ","translatedEnglishLine":"I am for the teacher's sake,"},{"lineNumber":158444,"originalJapaneseLine":"　イッパイ　オテツダイ」","translatedEnglishLine":"helping a lot.\""},{"lineNumber":158445,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホメテ　ホメテ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Praise me, praise me.\""},{"lineNumber":158446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、こっちにもいたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're here too?\""},{"lineNumber":158447,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえーい、エロヤックちゃんれすー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yay, it's Eroyak-chan here~\""},{"lineNumber":158448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オー　アテナサン　マタ　アエマシタネ♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh Athena-san, we meet again♪"},{"lineNumber":158449,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ハッピーバースデー♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"Happy Birthday♪\""},{"lineNumber":158450,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんじゃ？　こいつら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What the? Who are these guys?\""},{"lineNumber":158451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ボーイフレンドと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're boyfriend and"},{"lineNumber":158452,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガールフレンドの関係……","translatedEnglishLine":"girlfriend...\""},{"lineNumber":158453,"originalJapaneseLine":"　らしい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently...\""},{"lineNumber":158454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、そんなことはどうでもいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that doesn’t really matter.\""},{"lineNumber":158455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、お前、これの作者だな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you, you're the author of this, right?\""},{"lineNumber":158456,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、ドラゴンパッチか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, Dragon Patch, huh...\""},{"lineNumber":158457,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いかにも、それは儂が書いた本じゃが？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, that’s a book I wrote.\""},{"lineNumber":158458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この続きを書け、今すぐ、明日までに」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Write the sequel, immediately, by tomorrow.\""},{"lineNumber":158459,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあああああああ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whaaaaaaat!?\""},{"lineNumber":158460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、馬鹿言え。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, don't be ridiculous.\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Excuse me, I may have spoken out of turn."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっ、仕事はいくらでもある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, there’s plenty of work to do.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君も君の仕事をまっとうしてくれ」
さてさて、どこで何をしておられるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, where and what have you been doing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービル内を進むと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they proceeded inside the Hyper Building,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はみすぼらしい格好の老人と出くわした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others encountered an old man in shabby clothes.
"What? H-hey, the same goes for you.
"Who are you calling a beggar, you idiot!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これを見て分からんか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't you tell by looking at this!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはハイパービル内の真ん中で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the middle of the Hyper Building, Rance saw,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無造作に置かれたミカン箱と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a casually placed box of mandarins,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その上の原稿用紙とペンを見た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and on top of it, manuscript paper and a pen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんじゃ、お前さんは」
「お久しぶりです、サチコです」
「お前、こいつと知り合いなのか？」
「……ランスさんも会ったことありますよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Rance-san has met him before, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで二人とも忘れられるんですか……」
いったいお前さんら何しにここまで来た」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just what did you all come here for?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだってこんな場所にいやがる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you in a place like this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おかげで探すのに苦労したぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've made it hard to find you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふんっ、この高い部屋から見える景色、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, the view from this high room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが儂の創作意欲を疼かせるのじゃ」
「分からないことがあったら、
エロヤックに聞けば大抵答えが得られるしの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: usually you can get answers by asking Eroyak."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワタシ　センセイノ　タメ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am for the teacher's sake,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イッパイ　オテツダイ」
「いえーい、エロヤックちゃんれすー」
「オー　アテナサン　マタ　アエマシタネ♪
ガールフレンドの関係……
「まあ、そんなことはどうでもいい」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you, you're the author of this, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いかにも、それは儂が書いた本じゃが？」
「この続きを書け、今すぐ、明日までに」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
